name: LOOP (itch) (realwusang)
description:
A roguelike parkour game. All maps are generated randomly. Unlock the girl's story by finding the exit.

I have optimized the game feel to the best!

Operation: ASWD control girl’s movement; pressing left mouse button to operate girl to dash to the position of cursor in game’s world space; pressing right mouse button to operate girl to dash down quickly.

Game Goal: The player needs to operate girl to enter the exit within 10 seconds.
